casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alexander C. POLKE. No. 412A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 9, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, William Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of February 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Alexander Charles Polke) shall have up to and including the 8th day of March 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of February 2006."
